src:
Ada Proyek Flyover, Lalin Sekitar Lenteng Agung Padat
03 Nov 2019, 16:49 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - Lalu lintas (lalin) kendaraan di Jalan Lenteng Agung Raya, Pasar Minggu, Jakarta Selatan, sore ini mengalami kepadatan. Hal itu terjadi karena adanya proyek jalan layang (flyover).
"Benar, jadi masih cukup ramai dari informasi lalu lintas di kawasan Jalan Raya Pasar Minggu underpass-nya, kemudian ke arah Lenteng Agung ini kami pantau masih cukup ramai cenderung masih lancar," kata Petuga NTMC Polri, Dian ,saat dihubungi, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Kepadatan kendaraan terjadi mendekati proyek flyover tersebut. Namun kendaraan cenderung masih lancar.
"Mendekati proyek tersebut saja memang ada ketersendatan, tapi ini masih cukup ramai cenderung masih lancar," ujar Dian.
Kepadatan terjadi hanya puluhan meter. Titik-titik kemacetan juga hanya terjadi di sekitar proyek flyover.
"Ini hanya beberapa puluh meter saja," ucap Dian.
"(Titik kepadatan hanya) mendekati kawasan tersebut saja," imbuhnya.

(rfs/dkp)
text:
There is a Flyover Project, Lalin Around Lenteng Agung Solid
03 Nov 2019, 16:49 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - Traffic (traffic) vehicles on Jalan Lenteng Agung Raya, Pasar Minggu, South Jakarta, this afternoon experiencing overcrowding. That happened because of the flyover project.
"Right, so it is still quite busy from the traffic information in the Jalan Raya Pasar Minggu underpass area, then in the direction of Lenteng Agung, we monitor that it is still quite busy and tends to be still smooth," said Petuga NTMC National Police, Dian, when contacted on Sunday (3 / 11/2019).
Vehicle density occurred close to the flyover project. But vehicles tend to be still smooth.
"Approaching the project there was indeed a delay, but it was still quite busy and tended to be smooth," Dian said.
Density occurs only tens of meters. Congestion points also only occur around the flyover project.
"It's only a few tens of meters," Dian said.
"(The point of density is only) approaching the region," he added.

(rfs / dkp)
